description: Detect when authentications to important application(s) only required single-factor authentication
false_positives: If this was approved by System Administrator.
name: Authentications To Important Apps Using Single Factor Authentication
query: (winlog.event_data.Status:"Success" AND AppId:"Insert\ Application\ ID\ use\ OR\ for\ multiple" AND AuthenticationRequirement:"singleFactorAuthentication")
